https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zZgNbw77J0xtIudHgE8Uo5c49Fq.jpg Ryo and Natsu love each other immensely. They are also able to feel each other's pain. Their relationship is troubled when Ryo allows himself to be seduced by an office employee. A Painful Pair
